text: PARIS — The French authorities said on Friday that they had arrested two men suspected of being in contact with an assailant who killed three people at a church in Nice on Thursday, an attack that rattled the country and reignited fears of terrorism as officials blamed some foreign leaders for stoking hatred of France.
snippet: The men were suspected of being in contact with a knife-wielding assailant who killed three people at a church on Thursday, the French authorities said.
